alert.note: Alert for Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 7:17PM CST until February 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Turkey River at Spillville affecting Winneshiek County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Turkey River at Spillville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.0 feet on 06/18/1984. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 730 AM CST.
